title: 7 - Seven Murders in Heaven
description: This week the girls discuss their favorite unsolved murders, including The Black Dahlia and Elisa Lam. Plus a hometown murder story by Doug Loves Movie cohost Karen Anderson and listener's favorite murders!
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
